thread.title: 2016: Once again, piracy was so bad that the movie industry smashed all box office records
thread.title_full: 2016: Once again, piracy was so bad that the movie industry smashed all box office records

author: Cory Doctorow
title: 2016: Once again, piracy was so bad that the movie industry smashed all box office records
text: As has been the case for many consecutive years, the movie industry beat all box-office records in 2016 , earning $11.4B at the US box office (while simultaneously insisting that piracy was destroying the industry and demanding the right to control and redesign the internet to save itself from this existential threat).
